parameters.name: レクイエム・暗い場面

parameters:
\n<Ameria>"Alright... The priest should be in the storeroom now, so
this is my chance..."

\n<Ameria>"Let's see... The Medical Technique Manual, the Blue Book...
Blue Book...--Ah, here it is!"

parameters.name: 本・アルバム・ケースから出す

parameters: Ameria pulled a book from the shelf.

\n<Ameria>"They said it's too early for me to study it, but just
reading it should be fine... I'll read it tonight and sneak
it back afterwards."

\n<Ameria>"To make sure it's not noticeable, I'll push the other books
together......yeah, perfect! Now I won't get caught♪"
\n<Ameria>"...Okay. I need to hurry back before the priest--"
\n<Priest's voice>"Hmm? Are you in my room? What are you doing?"
\n<Ameria>"That is...! I was thinking of cleaning your room!"

\n<Priest's voice>"But I thought you cleaned it yesterday... Well, never mind.
Come here for a moment."

\n<Priest's voice>"Your sister has returned. She brought some strange
souvenirs. Help her carry them."

\n<Priest>"Ameria. Save the emotional reunion for later, first help
with this--...hey! What's that you're holding?"

\n<Priest>"You were trying to read my book without permission again,
weren't you!"

\n<Priest>"If you're going to read, do it without getting caught! You
want to get scolded by me?!"
